extendedInfo.description: Simple Missile Defense (SMD) is exactly what you would expect from a game of that title, also known as "Missile Command". Defend your buildings from the incoming missiles by firing intercept missiles from your Capitol building. This game is completely free with no annoying advertising. SMD features a classic Arcade mode and an Income based mode that requires you to keep the missile war at a peak, without going so far as to destroy yourself.There are 6 types of incoming missiles and 5 available power-up style drops. SMD was designed to be quick and smooth to play, yet good to look at with it's high-contrast colors and particle effects. The graphics scale based on your screen size, there are no low resolution pixelated bitmaps here. Includes cool-beans sound effects and an adaptive sound track that accelerates with the play.

reviews.title: Great but one improvement
reviews.comment: Excellent simple game that is very clever to play. The developer could have easily put ads on or charged for the game but didn\'t so for that thank you. Also makes you think where the missiles are going to land and gets your brain thinking. The only one improvement that could be in the game is its sensitivity and responsiveness for when you launch a missile other than that a great game.
reviews.author: Assad Awan

reviews.title: SO MUCH FUN
reviews.comment: This game is amazing. Alot of fun. I wish score loop was hooked up to it so  I could view my score against others.

reviews.title: Simply great fun!
reviews.comment: This game is a great deal of fun. The right mix of simple and fast game play making it very addictive. Also has scope for improvements/developments further along, although not essential. Another super offering from Brian Dewolf.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ALL FUN & ALL FREE
reviews.comment: BASIC RETRO-STYLE GAME WITH A MODERN TWIST \342\200\224 LOOKS FUTURISTIC... BUT COOL TOO. I HOPE THE DEVELOPER KEEPS MAKING MORE GAMES.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple, But Pretty Fun
reviews.comment: Five stars for a simple, hassle free game. No ads, no complicated controls, just a good game to spend a few minutes on when you have nothing to do. My only suggestion: add an upgrade system; maybe earn points by getting to higher levels/scores. Some upgrades could be a larger missile explosion radius, faster ammo reloading, etc. Nothing too in depth though, keep it simple.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome game

reviews.title: Get rid of the menu button.
reviews.comment: Your screenshots show that your app suffers the annoying menu button bar that takes up space on the bottom of the screen on your own device... you should fix that... not to mention on a device with on screen buttons there are two menu buttons...
reviews.author: A Google User
